speak;Morrissey;Ah, young Simon.
speak;Morrissey;I haven't seen you since you were a child, if my memory serves me.
speak;Morrissey;What brings you here?
speak;Simon;Lord Morrissey... I need your help.
speak;Simon;House Verstadt has fallen.
speak;Morrissey;Cutting right to the chase, I see.
speak;Morrissey;Well, young Simon, I'm glad you sought me out.
speak;Morrissey;We must stick together in times like these, after all.
speak;Morrissey;You are more than welcome to stay here.
speak;Morrissey;And I will help you retake House Verstadt when the time comes.
speak;Simon;...
speak;Simon;I-I cannot thank you enough.
speak;Morrissey;No need. As I said before, we cannot afford to act selfishly nowadays.{w}{br}The monsters... those "New Dawn" fanatics...{w}{br}All quite a shame.
s;Morrissey;With the world in such a state, we nobles need to band together.
wait;500
speak;Morrissey;Now, it seems like you've had a long day.
speak;Morrissey;I will have my servants prepare chambers for you and your retainers.
s;Morrissey;We'll speak on this more tomorrow.
speak;Simon;... Thank you sir.
speak;Simon;You will not regret giving me this chance.
